ygData.subject: Re: Mend Bones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 4 PP + for it and it hardly heals my skel at all takes a long time to cast and takes a decent amt of mana, what gives . . . Hello. I have found the
ygData.messageBody:
>Mata Wrote

>Does anyone else find this spell pretty useless? I feel so cheated I paid
4 PP + for it >and it hardly heals my skel at all takes a long time to cast
and takes a decent amt of >mana, what gives . . .

Hello.

I have found the spell, esp in combo with dark empathy to work very nicely
against asps. Since asps poison strongly, I send in pet after I cast a
darkness spell. I then try to get off a disease spell. Then I just alternate
mend bones and dark empathy. With this I was able to defeat lev 9 and 8 asps
at lev 9. With this method I am also able to defeat almost any lev 10 non
poisoning MOB in ecommons. I have killed lev 10 Y-Kodiacs, orc centurians
and lions. Or you can just use mend bones and when the pet is near death,
you can step in and tank for your pet.

What I like most about my necromancer is that there seems to be more then
one way to get the job done. My wizard and magician both seemed to only have
1 basic approach that either succeeded or failed. I'm likeing the
necromancer's larger variety of spells, though you can't use them all in
every situation.

Eloric (3rd Rank) Necromancer
Mithanial Marr
